content: drops christmas knitted drops mittens with cables in nepal drops extra 0-1207 drops design pattern no ne-200 yarn group c or a + a size s/m - m/l materials drops nepal from garnstudio 100 g for both sizes in color no 3620 red drops double pointed needles size 4 mm / us 6 - or size needed to get 19 sts x 25 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm / us 2 5 for rib
